remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，WMI 支持的唯一格式是*托管对象格式*(MOF)。Currently, the only format that WMI supports is *Managed Object Format* (MOF). 将来，其他格式将支持，如可扩展标记语言 (XML)。In the future, other formats will be supported, such as Extensible Markup Language (XML). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示的 MOF 代码**Win32_Process**类通过方法。The following example displays the MOF code for the **Win32_Process** class by using the method. 有关详细信息**Win32_Process**类，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about the **Win32_Process** class, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value A表示管理对象中定义的限定符。A that represents the qualifiers defined on the management object. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性显示的值**说明**为每个属性中的限定符**Win32_Process**类。The following example uses the property to display the value of the **Description** qualifier for each of the properties in the **Win32_Process** class. 有关详细信息**Win32_Process**类，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on the **Win32_Process** class, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. summary.span: 获取管理对象的 WMI 系统属性的集合（例如，类名、服务器和命名空间）。

span.span: Gets the collection of WMI system properties of the management object (for example, the class name, server, and namespace).

summary.span: WMI 系统属性名以“__”开头。

span.span: WMI system property names begin with "__".

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含管理对象的系统属性。

span.span: Returns a that contains the system properties for a management object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value A表示管理对象的系统属性。A that represents the system properties of the management object. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性显示的名称和值的系统属性**Win32_Process**类。The following example uses the property to display the name and value of the system properties for the **Win32_Process** class. 有关详细信息**Win32_Process**类，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on the **Win32_Process** class, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
